Engineers, software developers, data analysts, statisticians, and science graduates

highlights.title: Internationally Acclaimed Curriculum
highlights.description: Stay current with the latest advancements in ML, AI, and Data Science
details: Deep Learning, Computer Vision, NLP, MLOps, Generative AI

GitHub-ready project portfolio
Participate in global AI Hackathons and Applied ML case studies

Live workshops, faculty Q&As, and mentorship meetups
Career-focused bootcamps on MLOps, Prompt Engineering, and Model Deployment

Dedicated career coach and support for UK, India, and global roles

details: Become part of the Liverpool John Moores University global alumni network
Exclusive access to partner institution alumni groups and tech communities

key_learning_outcomes: Master full-stack ML pipelines: from data engineering to deployment
Build and fine-tune deep learning models for image and language tasks
Gain fluency in AI tools used in top tech companies
Develop end-to-end AI solutions using MLOps pipelines
Apply AI in real-world domains: finance, healthcare, retail, manufacturing, etc.
Lead innovation and transformation within your organization using AI strategy
